text: Cardi B ’ s career is on a steady climb, but her trajectory may come to a halt fairly soon. Fans seem to think Cardi is pulling a Kylie Jenner and concealing a pregnancy with her husband - to - be, Offset. Although it was just a rumor, one fan boldly questioned Cardi about her about an alleged bun in the oven and the rapper had quite the response. The “ Bartier Cardi ” rapper was just minding her business, posting videos on Instagram, when one of her fans posed the pregnancy question in her comments section. And of course, in true Cardi B fashion, she replied, “ No b * * * h. I ’ m just getting fat. Let me fat in peace. ” While no one likes to be asked about their sudden weight gain
